pie.bottom offset description: The downward displacement of the center of the pie chart from the container's center.
pie.bottom pad description: Space between the bottom edge of the pie chart and the bottom edge of the container.
pie.description for size of diameter: The diameter of a pie chart is expressed as the percentage of the length of the shorter side of the component container.
pie.description for size of slice: Size of the inscribed circle in a pie chart, which turns the pie chart into a donut chart, expressed as a percentage of the overall chart size.
pie.description for size of unslice: The width of the ring is expressed as the percentage of the radius of the pie chart. A smaller value will result a thinner the ring. Setting it to 100% will result a solid pie.
pie.description for stroke: Size of the border of the slices, expressed in no. of pixel(s)
pie.description of min show part: No data lables are displayed for slices that are smaller that the minimum proportion being set.
pie.label content description: The contents to be displayed in the data labels
pie.label position description: The position of the data labels
pie.left offset description: The leftward displacement of the center of the pie chart from the container's center.
pie.left pad description: Space between the left edge of the pie chart and the left edge of the container.
pie.name: Pie
pie.pie position description: Center position of the pie chart
pie.pie type description: Choose the chart style: Conventional, Radius rose or Area rose.
pie.primary dimension desc: Select a dimension to analyze the measure in further detail. Values of the selected dimension will be shown in the legend.
pie.right offset description: The rightward displacement of the center of the pie chart from the container's center.
pie.right pad description: Space between the right edge of the pie chart and the right edge of the container.
pie.top offset description: The upward displacement of the center of the pie chart from the container's center.
pie.top pad description: Space between the top edge of the pie chart and the top edge of the container.
pie.x position description: Horizontal position of the center of the pie chart
pie.y position description: Vertical position of the center of the pie chart.

data panel.cache description: When data caching is enabled, data is retrieved from the cache if the query remains unchanged. The cache refreshes every 60 minutes by default.

timePlayerComponent.name tip: The data components associated with them play their respective data along the TimeAxis
timePlayerComponent.start point description: When the play time reaches a certain point, the associated component will present all the data before that point to specify a start time for the play, from which the TimeAxis will move step by step to the last day of the valid time period, and then start from the first day and loop around

notice.auto fixed notification: The system detects a mismatch between the file and the software version and will perform calibration and correction
notice.clean the components: This will erase everything on the canvas. Are you sure to erase it?

error message.0: Map service is not responding, please contact the administrator.
error message.Access denied to modify this data: Access denied to modify this data
error message.bad schema connection: Invalid analysis model, the model may be damaged, or the data connection of the model may be invalid.
error message.calculated measure may not be defined: The calculated measure '{name}' is not defined
error message.calculated member not surpporte drill or: Calculated member do not support drill or filter
error message.clipboard not surpported: 'The current browser does not support direct access to the system pasteboard, please use Ctrl+V shortcuts'
error message.detect constant line value is empty: A constant line was detected without a specified value
error message.empty parent member defined: Please specify the parent member of the calculated member
error message.end edge value is not numeric: End value is not a valid number
error message.execute faild, please contact administra: The query failed, please contact the administrator.
error message.Faild to find parameter level: No level corresponding to the parameter was found
error message.Faild to find parameter measure: No measure corresponding to the parameter was found
error message.faild to get analysis schema: Analysis model metadata acquisition failed. Charts built on the model may be abnormal
error message.faild to location such node when edit cu: This node was not found in the model
error message.failed to fetch schema metadata: Failed to fetch the metadata of schema {name}, error message{msg}
error message.failed to found cube: Model not found, may have been removed.
error message.failed to load extend component resource: Failed to load extend component resources
error message.file name overide: File already exists, are you sure you want to overwrite it?
error message.format check faild, caused by parent for: Format verification failed, either because the previous level's format is invalid or the format is incorrect.
error message.geocode failed count: There are {count} geocoding failures, which are {details}
error message.i: The software License failed, the commercial version of the software needs a valid License
error message.invalid hierarchy detected: Level or measure required not found!
error message.invalid locale resource for component: The localization resource file format of component {name} is incorrect and cannot be parsed
error message.no edge value detected: Please specify a valid boundary value
error message.no tb related level found: Make sure that the Time LevelType property of the level in the time dimension has been specified correctly.
error message.no vector shape data for current region: No GeoJson data for the region
error message.page load failed: Faild to load page content,page is not accessible or has been deleted
error message.parent level not specify: The upper level does not specify a time format, or the time format is invalid. It is recommended to set the format of the previous level first, and then set this level.
error message.Please check that your input is reasonab: Please check whether the entered rule logic is reasonable
error message.please specify level type and level date: Please specify the time type and time format
error message.plugin init map faild: Plugin failed to initialize GeoJson map resources. Please contact administrator
error message.start edge great than end edge: The starting value is greater than the ending value
error message.start edge value is not numeric: The starting value is not a valid number
error message.unsaved content detected: There is content not saved yet, confirm close

notice.exit before edit conent unsaved: Detectd content not saved yet? Are you sure to leave the current page?

panel.select a group of longitude and latitude: Please select a group of longitude and latitude
panel.select dimension, maximum is 3: Each value is a point, maximum is 3 fields
panel.select filter dim: Apply filters by specifying conditions on dimension(s) and/or measure(s).

axis.axis enable description: Enable axis render on the chart
axis.axis label auto layout description: The scale labels on the axis is all showed
axis.axis max end description: Whether the maximum value on the data axis starts with the series maximum value, otherwise the system automatically assigns.
axis.axis min start description: Whether the minimum value on the data axis starts with the minimum value of the series, otherwise the system automatically assigns.
axis.axis name location description: Placed location for the axis name
axis.count of x grid line description: The number of gridlines to be shown. The actual number of lines will be adjusted automatically.
axis.count of y grid line description: The number of gridlines to be shown. The actual number of lines will be adjusted automatically.
axis.description for x value auto: Auto calculate the min and max value for X axis
axis.description for y value auto: Auto calculate the min and max value for Y axis
axis.enable x-axis label description: Show labels of the dimension chosen for X-axis
axis.enable x-axis name description: Show name of X-axis on the chart
axis.enable y-axis label description: Show labels of the dimension chosen for Y-axis
axis.enable y-axis name description: Show name of Y-axis on the chart
axis.r-axis name font desc: Font style of the bubble dimension label
axis.right y axis name description: The name of the Y axis
axis.value-axis label style: Font style of the scale labels
axis.x axis name description: The name of the X axis
axis.x axis zero align desc: The minimum value of the measure will be located on the Y-axis.
axis.x-axis label rotate description: Rotate X-axis labels in counter-clockwise direction. 0-90 degrees.
axis.x-axis label style: Font style of the X-axis labels
axis.x-axis name font desc: Font style of the name of X-axis
axis.y axis name description: The name of the Y axis
axis.y-axis label rotate description: Rotate Y-axis labels in counter-clockwise direction. 0-90 degrees.
axis.y-axis label style: Font style of the Y-axis labels
axis.y-axis name font desc: Font style of the name of Y-axis
axis.zero align description: The minimum value of the measure will be located on the X-axis.

border.border style desc: Line style of the border of the chart

data zoom.x position description: The horizontal position of the legend
data zoom.y position description: The Vertical position of the legend

frame.padding description: The space between canvas and border, acceptable value type is percentage or px

legend.font description: Font style of the legend text
legend.orientation description: Select the location for the legend
legend.position description: The position of the legend offset by percentage or px, e.g. 5% 5% or center 5%
legend.x position description: Horizontal position of the legend relative to the chart
legend.y position description: Vertical position of the legend relative to the chart

title.primary and sub margin description: The space between primary and sub title, acceptable value type is percentage or px
title.title padding description: The space between title and component border

universal.<=: is less than or equals to
universal.>=: is greater than or equals to
universal.axis category type description: 'Continuous' applies to numerical data or time series data, while 'categorical' applies to classification data
universal.border radius description: Select the roundness of the column corners, in number of pixels.
universal.button count each row desc: Count of the buttons each row
universal.color options desc: Customize the data color based on data values
universal.empty data join for linechart descriptio: Specify how empty data point is shown
universal.searched highlight font description: The font style of the searched text

panel.subscribers description: The subscriber can subscribe to a component's state change when the state of the component changes, the subscriber will be notified

universal.boundary group size desc: The minimum width for the columns used for adaptive categorical axis layout.
universal.css code snippet description: Custom CSS Code snippets on the page
universal.enlarge background description: Background color of the chart when enlarged
universal.font description: Font style, include font size, color, type, bold, and italic
universal.rules list description: Rule list (In case of conflict, rule with higher priority prevails)

list/dropdown controller.controller data panel desc:
You can use dropdown or list to select specific parameter values.

Parameter Usage Tips:

1. Use parameter values in calculated measures to achieve "What-if" analysis.

2. Dynamically control tab visibility through parameter values.

parameters controller.name: Parameters

numeric slider controller.axis label font desc: The font used for the axis labels
numeric slider controller.controller data panel desc:
You can use sliders to change the values of parameter(Numeric type).

Parameter Usage Tips:

1. Use parameter values in calculated measures to achieve "What-if" analysis.

2. Dynamically control tab visibility through parameter values.
numeric slider controller.input background desc: Background color of the input box
numeric slider controller.input border color desc: Color of the input box border
numeric slider controller.input font desc: Font style of the input box
numeric slider controller.slider label font desc: The font used for the slider label

parameters controller.subscription description: When the component state changes, the latest state value is assigned to the subscription parameter and passed to the connection where the parameter is located, refreshing the data

containerOptions.label: Tip/Alert options
containerOptions.previewDesc: Preview the pop-up effect without loading the content of the target page.
containerOptions.reportSizeMsgDes: The ratio and pixels of the width and height of the drill-through report page.
containerOptions.sizeRatioDes: The ratio of width to height for the dialog box.
containerOptions.widthDes: Dialog width as a percentage of the current page.

paramMaps.label: Filters
paramMaps.sourceDes: Fields available in the current report for filtering the drill-down report.
paramMaps.targetDes: The field values of the current report act as filtering conditions applied to the analysis model of the drill-down report.

report jump.report render mode desc: The size of the drill-through page in the dialog box
